doc.after: Hydrostatics concerns the conditions to which the vessel is subjected to while at rest in water and its ability to remain afloat This involves computing buoyancy displacement and other hydrostatic properties Trim The measure of the longitudinal inclination of the vessel Stability The ability of a vessel to restore itself to an upright position after being inclined by wind sea or loading conditions
